pages.text: $(li)Mud Balls can be thrown to other creatures just right clicking while you are holding them in your hand.$(br)$(li)They do not inflict to them any damage, but they push out away.

$(li)They can be used to craft $(l)Mud Blocks$() or $(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/kiln)Kiln$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l), make $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/environmental/mud_brick)Mud Bricks$(/l) smelting Mud Balls in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/ceramist)Ceramists$(/l) will exchange your Mud Balls by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).
